Bulletin № 25

Bulletin

Oct 25, 2022

Hi friends,

I recently watched a short video about an illustrator who lived on a remote island in Maine, where he worked in an old wooden barn.

I can't say the idea isn't appealing. In other possibly-related news, I'll be moving to Canada soon for a couple months.

What's New

  • New Card Frame: Lil Guys
  • Improved Sharing and Embeds
  • Improved URL Preview

  • Add Twitter Threads From Cards
  • Save Threads From Twitter by replying to tweets with “@KinopioClub save”

  • Resize Any Card

By popular demand, the next big feature I'll likely be building is global search. Talk to you soon,
